title: Bitcoin Whales Amassed $2.3 Billion Worth of BTC in 5 Weeks: Data
text: The accumulation phase by Bitcoin whales is yet to evaporate despite a lackluster trading.

title: Valkyrie Leveraged Bitcoin Futures ETF gets inspiration from TradFi memes
text: After being initially discussed in 2021, the investment fund is now capitalizing on the meme-worthy ticker for its new leveraged Bitcoin ETF.

title: Watch these BTC price levels as Bitcoin threatens to lose $27K support
text: Bitcoin remains in a tight range with low liquidity, but expectations for new local lows are increasing.

title: I Will Always Stick With Bitcoin: American Billionaire Paul Tudor Jones III
text: Paul Tudor Jones likes bitcoin because of its fixed maximum supply.

title: Crypto retail trading should be regulated as gambling: UK lawmakers
text: The volatility and purported lack of intrinsic value of most crypto assets make it particularly risky for consumers, the politicians claimed.

title: Lightning Labs launches rebranded 'Taro' amid Bitcoin's BRC-20 bottleneck
text: Lightning Labs have unveiled a new solution to the clunky process for minting new assets on the Bitcoin network.

title: CoinShares posts highest quarterly earnings since Q1 2022
text: Crypto investment firm CoinShares posted its most profitable quarter in a year, according to its latest quarterly earnings report.

text: Short-term metrics have a different story to tell.

title: Can you recover stolen Bitcoin from crypto scams?
text: Recovering stolen Bitcoin from crypto scams is challenging due to the anonymous nature of blockchain transactions and jurisdictional issues.

title: This Key On-chain Indicator Will Soon Join the List of Those Signalling a Bitcoin (BTC) Bull Market is Here
text: A growing number of on-chain and technical indicators, as well as analysis of Bitcoin's longer-term market cycle, are signaling that BTC is in the early stages of a new bull market.

title: Valkyrie Goes for a Leveraged Bitcoin Futures ETF Dubbed 'BUFD' in Regulatory Filing
text: Asset management firm Valkyrie filed an application to a US regulator to launch a leveraged bitcoin futures ETF with an interesting ticker symbol.

title: ‘Trusted seller’ vends fake Trezor wallets stealing crypto: Kaspersky
text: Cryptocurrency users are once again reminded about the importance of using only authentic hardware wallets.

title: Bitcoin Lightning company River raises $35M amid ‘new wave of institutional adoption’
text: “We’re seeing another wave of Bitcoin interest, largely driven by business and institutional adoption,” says Alex Leishman, River CEO. “It’s not fueled by hype.”

title: Bitcoin trader eyes CME gap with $24K BTC price dip target in play
text: Bitcoin may be in line for a final trip lower before recovery, analysis forecasts, with BTC price still lacking direction.

title: BlockFi used customer money to buy $30M insurance, creditors claim
text: BlockFi said last Friday that it might not generate value for creditors by selling its cryptocurrency lending platform.
